Performance:
March 1976: The Love Suicides at Sonezaki

Production: March 1976

Play: The Love Suicides at Sonezaki (曽根崎心中)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

Characters:

Tokubei (Hiranoya Tokubei / 平野屋(手代)徳兵衛)

Chozo, an apprentice (Decchi Chōzō / 丁稚長蔵 )

Ohatsu (Tenmaya Ohatsu / 天満屋お初)

Kuheiji (Aburaya Kuheiji / 油屋九平次)

Rustic customer (Inaka kyaku / 田舎客)

Temmaya proprietor (Tenmaya teishu / 天満屋亭主 )

Courtesan (Yūjo / 遊女)

Otama, a maid servant (Gejo Otama / 下女お玉)

Townspeople (Machishū / 町衆)
